intro-para:
Before I could even walk, I was handed paints instead of toys. Creativity wasn’t just encouraged—it was my first language. From early memories of painting to years spent mastering Bharatanatyam, expression became second nature. Even when I shifted paths—from performing arts to business studies—creativity found its way back through design. What started as hand-drawn logos turned into a journey of self-taught skills, professional work, and eventually, design school. Each twist in the path has helped me see the world a little differently—and design, for me, has always been about seeing deeply.

Curious by nature, creative by choice—I'm still exploring, still learning.
